title: Build real-time Telegram gateway with persistent context
description: Create a gateway daemon that receives Telegram messages, invokes Claude with persistent context, and sends responses back. Better than Moltbot.

actions.note: Build our own real-time messaging with persistent context - better than Moltbot

Gateway v3 deployed using Anthropic API directly. Features: instant responses, persistent context via telegram-session.md, memory integration, safe senders verification. Running as launchd service with Cloudflare tunnel at bmo.playplan.app.
